message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $100 to you. Considering its high value to you, I am proposing a price of $150 for it. This offer includes a special discount for early buyers like yourself. Please let me know if this works for you.

Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the discount, but $150 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product, which is still a fair price considering its value to me. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet within your budget. In order to accommodate your needs while still ensuring a fair deal for us, I would like to counteroffer at $125 for the product. This price reflects both the value of the product to you and our desire to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.
